title: If I Die
lyrics:
What will you remember of me when I die?
Selfishness my anger, greed or my lies
Yes I want you to know
That honestly I did try to be better in this life
Shared so many memories that have shaped you and me

Don't you forget them cause then you might forget me

Lessons you teach I hope you find peace

That's all that matters to me



Oh mother don't forget me when I die

(Forget me)

If I die

(Forget me)

Oh mother dont forget me when I die

Oh if I die



I'm sorry for your troubles

How can I make it right?

I just wanna see you smile

Back as I float through the sky aay

There's no need to cry

Thank you for giving me life



Won't always go the way we want it to

But that's life, thats what makes it beautiful

As I die there's someone new

To enter the world live it to the full

Dont think it so cruel

Oh no I don't feel no pain

I know I'll see you again



Oh mother don't forget me when I die

(Forget me)

When I die

(Forget me)

Oh no, oh don't mother don't forget me when I die

Yeah if I die



Yeah oh oh oo ooo

Ooo oooh mother don't forget me when I die

Ooo yeah yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah

(Forget me)

If I die oh

(Forget me)

Oh ooo oo no no my, my, my

Oh mother don't forget me when I die

Oh if I die
